hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Source folder containing the scripts source_scripts_folder="${JENKINS_HOME}/workspace/Bash_Functions/" ls -la "$source_scripts_folder"
# Iterate through the files in the folder and source them for script_file in "$source_scripts_folder"*.sh; do chmod +x "$script_file" if [ -f "$script_file" ] && [ -x "$script_file" ]; then echo "sourcing $script_file" source "$script_file" fi done
assume_role
# Download the terraform state file echo "Download terraform.tfstate file for $TARGET_STACK stack" aws s3 cp s3://$S3_BUCKET_NAME/deployment_state_metadata/$TARGET_STACK/terraform.tfstate terraform.tfstate
# Extract the Wildfly EC2 instance ID echo "Extract WildFly instance ID for $TARGET_STACK stack" wildfly_instance_id=$(jq -r '.outputs["wildfly-ec2-id"].value' terraform.tfstate) echo "WildFly Instance ID: ${wildfly_instance_id}"
update_dictionary_container="sudo /home/centos/dictionary-docker.sh --stack_s3_bucket $S3_BUCKET_NAME --target_stack=$TARGET_STACK" echo "$update_dictionary_container"
update_dictionary_container_json=$(jq -n --arg cmd "$update_dictionary_container" '{commands: [$cmd]}') echo "JSON version of run command: $update_dictionary_container_json"
command_id=$(aws ssm send-command \ --instance-ids "${wildfly_instance_id}" \ --document-name "AWS-RunShellScript" \ --comment "Deploy httpd in place" \ --parameters "$update_dictionary_container_json" \ --query "Command.CommandId" \ --output text)
wait_for_command ${command_id} ${wildfly_instance_id}
reset_role
